CreateAndStartBackupPlan.title: CreateAndStartBackupPlan
CreateAndStartBackupPlan.summary: Creates, configures, and starts a backup plan.

CreateBackupPlan.title: CreateBackupPlan
CreateBackupPlan.summary: Creates a Database Backup Service (DBS) backup plan.

CreateFullBackupSetDownload.title: CreateFullBackupSetDownload
CreateFullBackupSetDownload.summary: This operation creates a task to download a full backup set.

CreateGetDBListFromAgentTask.title: CreateGetDBListFromAgentTask
CreateGetDBListFromAgentTask.summary: Creates a task to obtain a database list by using a backup gateway.

CreateIncrementBackupSetDownload.title: CreateIncrementBackupSetDownload
CreateIncrementBackupSetDownload.summary: Creates and starts an incremental backup set download task.

CreateRestoreTask.title: CreateRestoreTask
CreateRestoreTask.summary: Creates a Database Backup Service (DBS) restore job.

DescribeBackupGatewayList.title: DescribeBackupGatewayList
DescribeBackupGatewayList.summary: Queries a list of backup gateways in Database Backup Service (DBS).

DescribeBackupPlanBilling.title: DescribeBackupPlanBilling
DescribeBackupPlanBilling.summary: This operation queries the billing information of a backup plan.

DescribeBackupPlanList.title: DescribeBackupPlanList
DescribeBackupPlanList.summary: Queries the details of one or more DBS backup plans.

DescribeBackupSetDownloadTaskList.title: DescribeBackupSetDownloadTaskList
DescribeBackupSetDownloadTaskList.summary: Queries the list of download tasks for backup sets in Database Backup Service (DBS).

DescribeDLAService.title: DescribeDLAService
DescribeDLAService.summary: Queries the status of the Data Lake Analytics (DLA) service for a backup schedule.

DescribeFullBackupList.title: DescribeFullBackupList
DescribeFullBackupList.summary: Queries the list of full backup jobs in Database Backup Service (DBS).

DescribeIncrementBackupList.title: DescribeIncrementBackupList
DescribeIncrementBackupList.summary: Queries the list of Database Backup Service (DBS) incremental backup jobs.

DescribeJobErrorCode.title: DescribeJobErrorCode
DescribeJobErrorCode.summary: Queries the error code of a Database Backup Service (DBS) job.

DescribeNodeCidrList.title: DescribeNodeCidrList
DescribeNodeCidrList.summary: Queries the CIDR blocks of nodes on which Database Backup (DBS) is running.

DescribePreCheckProgressList.title: DescribePreCheckProgressList
DescribePreCheckProgressList.summary: This operation queries the precheck progress for a backup plan or a restore job.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions where DBS is available.

DescribeRestoreRangeInfo.title: DescribeRestoreRangeInfo
DescribeRestoreRangeInfo.summary: Queries the range of time to which you can restore data in a backup schedule.

DescribeRestoreTaskList.title: DescribeRestoreTaskList
DescribeRestoreTaskList.summary: Queries the list of Database Backup Service (DBS) restore jobs.

DisableBackupLog.title: DisableBackupLog
DisableBackupLog.summary: Disables incremental backup for a backup schedule.

EnableBackupLog.title: EnableBackupLog
EnableBackupLog.summary: Enables incremental backup for a backup schedule.

GetDBListFromAgent.title: GetDBListFromAgent
GetDBListFromAgent.summary: Queries the result of a task that is used to query a database list by using a backup gateway based on the ID of the task.

InitializeDbsServiceLinkedRole.title: InitializeDbsServiceLinkedRole
InitializeDbsServiceLinkedRole.summary: Grants the service-linked role (AliyunServiceRoleForDBS) to Database Backup (DBS).

ModifyBackupObjects.title: ModifyBackupObjects
ModifyBackupObjects.summary: Modifies the objects included in a Database Backup Service (DBS) backup plan.

ModifyBackupPlanName.title: ModifyBackupPlanName
ModifyBackupPlanName.summary: Modifies the name of a backup plan.

ModifyBackupSetDownloadRules.title: ModifyBackupSetDownloadRules
ModifyBackupSetDownloadRules.summary: Enables, configures, or disables the automatic download feature.

ModifyBackupSourceEndpoint.title: ModifyBackupSourceEndpoint
ModifyBackupSourceEndpoint.summary: Modifies the source endpoint of a database backup.

ModifyBackupStrategy.title: ModifyBackupStrategy
ModifyBackupStrategy.summary: Modifies the backup time of a backup schedule.

ModifyStorageStrategy.title: ModifyStorageStrategy
ModifyStorageStrategy.summary: Modifies the lifecycle of data that is backed up based on a backup schedule.

ReleaseBackupPlan.title: ReleaseBackupPlan
ReleaseBackupPlan.summary: This operation releases a pay-as-you-go backup plan.

StartBackupPlan.title: StartBackupPlan
StartBackupPlan.summary: This operation starts a DBS backup plan.

StopBackupPlan.title: StopBackupPlan
StopBackupPlan.summary: This operation pauses a DBS backup plan.
